ModMetaData.name: Biosculpter Pod and Neural Supercharger Variations
ModMetaData.author: Syrus
ModMetaData.description:
Differently sized variations for the Biosculpter Pod and Neural Supercharger.
Available dimensions for Biosculpter Pod are: 3x2 (standard), 2x2 (left), 2x2 (right), 1x2, 1x3
Available dimensions for Neural Supercharger are: 1x3 (standard), 1x2
Includes many settings to adjust each of the Biosculpter Pods, Neural Superchargers and the Sleep Accelerator to your liking.
